advancements.hexed.ultrakill.title: The Cyber Grind
enchantment.hexed.aflame.desc: Sets enemies ablaze upon impact, but also ignites the user.
enchantment.hexed.persecuted.desc: Converts Attack Damage into a percentage of the enemyâ€™s Health, any damage received will lower the user's armor.
enchantment.hexed.ephemeral.desc: Initially deals more damage than the item normally would, but its damage output diminishes with exhaustive use.
enchantment.hexed.vindictive.desc: Applies an effect that deals multiplicative damage as it runs out, at the cost of losing regeneration.
enchantment.hexed.traitorous.desc: Attacks from behind halt enemy health regeneration briefly, while your weapon undergoes a cooldown.
enchantment.hexed.displaced.desc: Swaps the Armor and Armor Toughness values.
enchantment.hexed.aquatique.desc: Greatly increases your swimming speed, at the cost of higher fall damage.
enchantment.hexed.bloodthirsty.desc: Killing an enemy heals a portion of your health, but all other healing effects are disabled. Increases your Max Health by 4 hearts.
enchantment.hexed.disfigurement.desc: When the wearer is hit, every living creature in a certain area is Hungered and Weakened, including the wearer.
enchantment.hexed.metamorphosis.desc: Any healing that exceeds max health is turned into food. Natural regeneration is turned off.
enchantment.hexed.ironclad.desc: Damage received is reduced by 33%. If your health isn't full, upon taking damage, a heart will be temporarily deducted from your Max Health.
enchantment.hexed.divine.desc: Doubles all newly generated loot in chests. Will curse the wearer with a random Debuff upon opening a loot chest.
enchantment.hexed.dynamique.desc: Increases jump height, at the cost of higher fall damage.
enchantment.hexed.averting.desc: Provides a chance to dodge incoming damage. For a short time after dodging damage, removes invinsibility frames.
enchantment.hexed.frantic.desc: Taking damage increases movement speed, multiplying damage taken in return.
enchantment.hexed.volatility.desc: Arrows explode upon impact, dealing area-of-effect damage to nearby entities. Not pulling the bow fully makes the arrow explode prematurely (aka right in your face).
enchantment.hexed.aggravate.desc: Holding down the bow after charging it will add more arrows to the shot.
enchantment.hexed.phased.desc: Charge a piercing projectile with increased damage. Deals more damage every time it passes through an enemy. Locks all bows into cooldown once shot.
enchantment.hexed.resentful.desc: Makes the damage of projectiles vary based on how far the hit target is from you. The farther, the more damage, and vice versa.
enchantment.hexed.celebration.desc: Converts your arrows into random fireworks and makes the crossbow have the ability to shoot automatically. Some fireworks may be faulty and not actually fly away.
enchantment.hexed.provision.desc: Upon shooting, a quick time event for a "Quick Reload" will appear. Succeeding will reload the crossbow prematurely, failing will put it on a cooldown.
enchantment.hexed.overclock.desc: The crossbow fires automatically, each consecutive shot will charge up faster, but "Overheats" the crossbow.
enchantment.hexed.linger.desc: The trident will create an area of blazing ash when on the ground. This will cause it to slowly lose durability.
enchantment.hexed.flaring.desc: The trident will cause fire to rain down from above while it is in the air.
enchantment.hexed.seize.desc: Pulls the creature that the trident hits towards the user. Combines with Loyalty.
enchantment.hexed.sepulture.desc: Summons a couple of Blazing Skulls upon hitting an enemy.
enchantment.hexed.amplify.desc: Expands mining capabilities to a 3x3 area, though the resources from the surrounding blocks are not always guaranteed.
enchantment.hexed.overburden.desc: Boosts mining speed with each block mined, but gradually slows down the user's movement speed over time.
enchantment.hexed.famishment.desc: Consumes player saturation instead of item durability, enabling prolonged usage without equipment degradation.
enchantment.hexed.ruinous.desc: Mining blocks causes them to explode, destroying nearby blocks.
effect.hexed.aflame.description: Constantly puts the affected creature on fire.
effect.hexed.ablaze.description: Slowly damages the affected creature, ignores armor.
effect.hexed.ethereal.description: Reduces the armor of the affected creature.
effect.hexed.exhaustion.description: Reduces the damage done by the affected creature.
effect.hexed.vindictive.description: Deals damage to the affected creature. Damage dealt is proportionate to the amplifier of the effect when the effect runs out.
effect.hexed.smouldering.description: The affected creature loses any type of regeneration.
effect.hexed.traitorous.description: The affected creature loses any type of regeneration.
effect.hexed.ironclad.description: Decreases Max Health of the affected creature.
effect.hexed.frantic.description: Increases movement speed, and damage received of the affected creature.
effect.hexed.overburden.description: Increases mining speed, but decreases the movement speed of the affected creature.
effect.hexed.blighted.description: The affected creature loses any type of regeneration.
death.attack.ablazed.player: %1$s turned into searing ashes whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.vindictive.player: %1$s got multiplied by zero whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.frantic.player: %1$s's pain receptors got overloaded whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.abyssal_crush: %1$s got crushed by the inner abyss
death.attack.abyssal_crush.player: %1$s got crushed by the inner abyss whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.blazing_wave: %1$s got swooped by the fiery aura
death.attack.blazing_wave.player: %1$s got swooped by the fiery aura whilst fighting %2$s
tooltip.hexed.calamaidas_plushie: Things are about to get calamitous!
tooltip.hexed.miri_plushie: We're gonna build so many Miri-acles.
tooltip.hexed.blighted_harvest: ...The Blood of who came before Me
tooltip.hexed.blazing_basher: A horrible tool, a fire incarnate. Scourge from another world...
tooltip.hexed.baleful_carnage: In Blood and Flames, may Death cry your name...
tooltip.hexed.brimstone_candle.line_3: Required to make the Altar of the Accursed function.
tooltip.hexed.accursed_altar.line_1: A terrific display of great power,
tooltip.hexed.accursed_altar.line_3: Has the ability to apply special enchantments on items
tooltip.hexed.lichlore_candle.line_3: Counts as 2 Bookshelves for the Enchanting Table.
tooltip.hexed.calamitous_armor.line_1: If you're looking for some fourth-degree
tooltip.hexed.calamitous_armor.line_2: burns, you've got the right person.
tooltip.hexed.brimstone_crystal.line_2: Used to make an Altar of the Accursed
tooltip.hexed.calamitous_fabric.line_1: Special fabric, interwoven with necrotic magic.
message.hexed.altar_no_candles: Altar lacks Lit Brimstone Candles nearby to function.
message.hexed.altar_used: The Brimstone Candles extinguished, despite your efforts to keep them Lit.
message.hexed.error.config.general: An error occured while loading config. Using defaults. Check out logs for details
